raw_answer.rationale: Annotated values near bars disagree with bar heights, indicating the chart visually misstates the data.

trace.model_output_excerpt:
THOUGHT: Plausible misleaders: 1) dual-panel/multi-scale setup that effectively acts like dual axis, 2) truncated axis (y-axis starting above zero) exaggerating changes, 3) inconsistent tick intervals due to different scales across panels. I'll test the y-axis for truncation by locating its ticks and range.

ACTION: {"tool":"axis_localizer","args":{"image":{"$ref":"input.image"},"axis":"y","axis_threshold":0.2}}

THOUGHT: I will test whether the annotated numeric labels near the bars align with the bar heights by using bar_value_consistency. If a mismatch is detected, it supports misrepresentation.

ACTION: {"tool":"bar_value_consistency","args":{"image":{"$ref":"input.image"},"bar_orientation":"vertical"}}
